legal_basis: Mandamus requires: (1) public legal duty to act, (2) duty owed to applicant, (3) clear right to performance, (4) no other adequate remedy.
cause_of_action: Unreasonable delay in processing citizenship application due to prolonged CSIS investigation.
procedure_followed: Judicial review application filed in Federal Court, Trial Division, arguing unreasonable delay and usurpation of authority.
decision_reasoning: Three-year delay deemed unreasonable; CSIS's role was advisory but acted as if it had decision-making power, implying refusal.
result_of_case: Court granted mandamus, directing Minister to process application within specified conditions.
